original_text: And I will do in thee that which I have not done, and whereunto I will not do any more the like, because of all thine abominations.
korean_text: 네 모든 가증한 일로 말미암아 내가 전무후무하게 네게 내릴지라

sentences.original_text: And I will do in thee
that which I have not done
and whereunto I will not do any more like
